text: Need Scarlett Turner for Fantastic Furniture campaign. Budget around $3,478, looking for 2 x Instagram story, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Pinterest pin, 1 x TV appearance, 1 x Instagram post. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
